nano.debugger
Class LogFile

java.lang.Object
  nano.debugger.LogFile

public class LogFile
extends java.lang.Object

This class gives tools to maintain a log file and also keep track of running htreads.

Version:
1.1 23.08.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch

Field Detail

log

public java.util.logging.Logger log
Constructor Detail

LogFile

public LogFile(java.lang.String logFileName)
Invokes an object that passes information to a log file. This function also adds a simple format to the log file output.

Parameters:
logFileName - The extension of the log file. It is added to a date string and a sequential number that is used to increase if the log file grows too big.
Method Detail

addToLog

public void addToLog(java.lang.String msg)
Places information in the log file.

Parameters:
msg - the string to be stored in the log file.

addThread

public void addThread(ThreadHandler th)
Adds a string to the list of observed @see ThreadHandler.

Parameters:
th - the thread to be observed

removeThread

public void removeThread(ThreadHandler th)
Removes a thread from the list of observed @see ThreadHandler.

Parameters:
th - the thread to be removed from the list

printThreadNames

public void printThreadNames()
Sends a list of running threads to the debug module.

closeLog

public void closeLog()
Closes the log file and clean the list of observed threads.
